channel.title: Astronomer of the Day

item.title: Jens Martin Knudsen (astrophysicist)
item.description: Jens Martin Knudsen (12 October 1930 â€“ 17 February 2005) was a Danish astrophysicist. During his scientific career Knudsen authored or co-authored more than 100 scientific articles, and was a longtime advisor to NASA.
